briefTitle: The Efficacy and Safety of Lenvatinib Combined With Sindilimab and Nab-paclitaxel in the First-line Treatment for Recurrent and Metastatic Triple Negative Breast Cancer: a Phase Ib/IIa Clinical Trial.
officialTitle: The Efficacy and Safety of Lenvatinib Combined With Sindilimab and Nab-paclitaxel in the First-line Treatment for Recurrent and Metastatic Triple Negative Breast Cancer: a Phase Ib/IIa Clinical Trial.
